item.title: Blender Texturing Exercise
item.description: What to Submit An OBS recording and voice over of what you’ve done A screenshot or render of the following The first object painted The second object painted The object in substance painted or materials set up Objectives Download the Blend file -> Watch the overview video -> Complete the exercises.
